product.name: Private | Pay-As-You-Use
product.shortDescription: Get all the private banking perks you deserve. A monthly maintenance fee applies, then only pay for the transactions you use.

productFeature.name: Credit card
value: R118 pm credit card service fee

productFeature.name: Overdraft
value: R49 pm for overdraft limits up to R10 000 or R69 pm for limits more than R10 000; and
a once-off initiation fee will be charged.

features.name: eNotes alerts
features.description: Get notified by SMS every time a transaction happens on your account.

features.name: No-funds alert
features.description: Get notified by SMS when you don't have enough funds to pay your debit orders.

features.name: Debit card
features.description: Linked to your current account, your debit card includes lots of travel, reward and lifestyle perks. Get a second card for free!

features.name: Earn as you swipe
features.description: Every time you use a Nedbank debit or credit card online or instore, youâ€™ll earn Greenbacks that you can spend at any store or convert to cash at a Nedbank ATM. Earn double your Greenbacks when using your American Express credit card.
